lyrics:
11 contributorsstab my back lyricsverse 1
now were broken on the floor
she just wants me to share her
it hasnt been this way before

chorus
the phone rings and she screams
stab my back its better
when i bleed for you
walk on me it never was enough to do
i cant get past her
falling faster
its true
it hasnt done a lot for you

verse 2
and every time he held you close
yeah were you thinking of me
when i needed you the most
well i hope that youre happy

chorus
the phone rings and she screams
stab my back its better
when i bleed for you

i cant get past her

its better when i bleed for you

was just enough to save you

just look at what youre tearing apart

it never was enough to do
